body_html:
@alextp, I have updated the custome_getter. Now the customer_getter has two maps and is directly available to the optimizer.
I do not understand why the update of global/local center variables will be better in apply_dense / apply_sparse methods. It may needs much more codes.

body:
@alextp, I have updated the custome_getter. Now the customer_getter has two maps and is directly available to the optimizer.
I do not understand why the update of global/local center variables will be better in apply_dense / apply_sparse methods. It may needs much more codes.
